description: This file contains a singleton helper class for managing an SQLite database in a Flutter/Dart application. It handles opening the database, creating the schema for notes, and upgrading the database schema when needed.

classes.name: DatabaseHelper
classes.description: A singleton class that provides methods for initializing, opening, and managing the SQLite database for notes.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Provides a singleton instance of the open database, opening it if it has not been opened yet.

methods.name: _openDatabase
methods.description: Internal method to initialize the database, set the path, and handle schema creation and upgrades.

methods.name: _onCreate
methods.description: Callback invoked when creating the database; creates the notes table with specified columns.

methods.name: _onUpgrade
methods.description: Callback invoked when upgrading the database schema; placeholder for migration logic.
